item.title: Markdown Crash Course For Beginners and FAQs
item.description: Before we start Hi! I’m back, today we are going to use Markdown, which is a powerful lightweight markup language for creating beautiful formatted text using only a text editor. Part 1: Install a better text editor There are many software compatible with Markdown syntax and some of them have their own features. Out of all these, I suggest to use: Visual Studio Code (Recommended), which is a powerful editor by Microsoft.
